short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Puts margins from FlipChat1 into a sortable table.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What it does:
Creates a table for each margin post on the FlipChat1 forum. The tables have profit columns so you can easily see which items have the largest margins. 

How to use:
- Extension runs automatically when you open a margin thread on the FlipChat1 forums.
- Click on the extension icon to hide/show the margin tables (shown by default).
- Click on the headers of the table to sort by that column.
- Shift+click headers to sort by multiple columns.

Change log:
1.3.0 - Changed to create and show table by default.
1.3.0 - Added a toggle feature.
1.3.1 - Fixed an error that caused only the last table to toggle.
1.3.2 - Fixed an error that caused the tables not to display when opening margins from the notifications panel.
1.4.0 - Performance fixes.
1.4.1 - All columns should be of the same width now.
1.5.0 - Fixed an error that missed out items on spotlight.
1.5.0 - Fixed a bug caused by asterisks.
1.5.1 - Made easier to identify sorted column with colour and arrows.
1.6.0 - Fixed to work with new forum styles.
1.7.0 - Updated to work after removal of GWD1 items.
